channel.title: Softlayer_resource_configuration on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_resource_configuration on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Resource_Configuration
item.description: SoftLayer_Resource_Configuration Service Datatype Description The Resource Configuration service enables the user to update data regarding a resource from which the request originates. It is a requirement that the request must have an authentication token as well as originate from the backend network of the resource. Methods setOsPasswordFromEncrypted Set resource operating system password from an encrypted password

item.title: setOsPasswordFromEncrypted
item.description: SoftLayer_Resource_Configuration::setOsPasswordFromEncrypted Set resource operating system password from an encrypted password Overview The setOsPasswordFromEncrypted method is used to set the operating system password from a key/pair encrypted password signed by SoftLayer. Parameters Name Type Description encryptedPassword string Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers Return Values boolean
